desc.en: CCC is a new deflationary token, which uses EOS as the value support and deflates through the burning rate adjusted by smart contract. The peak burning rate can be as high as 30%, allowing HODL users of CCC to get high returns. All EOS accounts can claim it!
desc.zh: CCC是新型通缩代币，以EOS作为价值支撑标的，并通过智能合约调节的燃烧率进行通缩，燃烧率峰值可高达30%，让CCC的HODL用户获得高额回报。CCC没有领取门槛，所有EOS账户皆可领取！
